subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Edgerrin James and Clinton Portis, pals from the University of Miami, are two of only six players in league history to average at least 110 total yards from scrimmage a game.
snippet: Edgerrin James and Clinton Portis, pals from the University of Miami, are two of only six players in league history to average at least 110 total yards from scrimmage a game.
